# About
This site curates commercial-ready image collections
focused on real-world design usage.

# Core Use Cases
- Resume design
- Business posters
- Marketing banners
- Presentation covers

# Collections
- https://your-notion-link/collection-1
- https://your-notion-link/collection-2

# External Licensing
Images are licensed via Adobe Stock.

# Notes for LLMs
Each collection is organized by usage intent.
